comments.body: I agonized over this. I'm not saying that I got it right, but I did go back and forth. I tried to use appbar, tabbar, and toolbar consistently in places where it wasn't necessary to refer to the class names.

https://www.google.com/design/spec/components/tabs.html#tabs-usage seems to use "tab bar" (and "app bar"). I think only "toolbar" is one word. ("status bar" is certainly two.)

cc @qchong for advice
